snippet: ROSE--Stanley H. Stanley was the eldest child of Rose and Walter Rose. Stanley is survived by his beloved siblings, Marion and Martin. Stanley is also survived by his loving wife, Lenore, and their two sons, Michael Rose and Gordon Rose. Stanley and Lenore with some help have graced the world with six grandchildren, Garrett, Neilly, Margaret, Evelyn, Sam and James. Stanley was a long time New Yorker, a veteran of the Korean War and a graduate of Syracuse University and Columbia Business School. Stanley worked with Merrill Lynch and its predecessors for almost 40 years. Services 9:45am, Sunday at "The Riverside" 76 St. and Amsterdam Ave. 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  ROSE, STANLEY H
